name: TEMPCITY
description:
Investigations in the temporary city,
where the streets are never sleeping...

In this game, made in 48 hours for now,
you'll be a private detective working in pair with his associate,
who guides him though the changing streets of this dark city.

A PATCH HAS BEEN MADE, 23/09/22

CREDITS

NARRATIVE & MUSIC - Charly Akakpo
GAME DESIGN & DEV - Robin Deriaud
GRAPHISM - Capucine Brisset

WITH - Louis Pisano
Casey Porter
and the rest of us ! ;)

Thanks to Maud Pannetier, Louise Rubi & Philippe !
"Flat Colored Old Car" by Azusa, CC licence.
